nodes.text: The Scarlet Pirate was an episodic HoloNet serial that aired its finale on the eleventh day of the fourth month in 22 BBY. The concluding installment was broadcast on Feed LFN422 at 2120 that day.

The Scarlet Pirate was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 51. The section that referenced the show, titled "What to Scan", was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
